description: This Dart file defines Flutter UI screens and widgets for a TV-based app interface, including top navigation, detail, search, watchlist, and settings screens, utilizing focus management for D-pad navigation.

classes.name: TopNavBar
classes.description: A focusable top navigation bar designed for TV/D-pad navigation, with tabs for different app sections and a search icon.

classes.name: _TopNavBarState
classes.description: State management for TopNavBar, handling focus nodes and navigation actions.

classes.name: _TvTabButton
classes.description: A focusable button widget for individual navigation tabs, highlighting on focus or hover.

classes.name: _TvTabButtonState
classes.description: State for focus and hover effects of _TvTabButton.

classes.name: _TvIconButton
classes.description: A focusable icon button in the navigation bar, with hover and focus effects.

classes.name: _TvIconButtonState
classes.description: State for focus and hover effects of _TvIconButton.

classes.name: DetailsScreen
classes.description: A scaffold for displaying detailed content with focusable buttons and navigation, accepting optional arguments.

classes.name: _DetailsButtons
classes.description: Widget containing focusable 'Play' and 'Add to Watchlist' buttons.

classes.name: _DetailsButtonsState
classes.description: State managing focus for detail action buttons.

classes.name: SearchScreen
classes.description: A focusable search interface with a dummy search field and a list of recent searches.

classes.name: _SearchScreenState
classes.description: State management for focus and interactions in the SearchScreen.

classes.name: WatchlistScreen
classes.description: Displays a list of watchlist items with focusable 'Remove' buttons.

classes.name: _WatchlistRow
classes.description: A row displaying a watchlist item with a focusable 'Remove' button.

classes.name: _WatchlistRowState
classes.description: State managing focus for the 'Remove' button in watchlist rows.

classes.name: SettingsScreen
classes.description: A list of focusable setting options with icons and descriptions.

classes.name: _SettingsTile
classes.description: A widget for an individual setting entry with focus and interaction handling.

classes.name: _SettingsTileState
classes.description: State managing focus, hover, and pressed states for a setting tile.

classes.name: _FilledTvButton
classes.description: A focusable elevated button with icon and label styling, used in various screens.

classes.name: _FilledTvButtonState
classes.description: State handling focus, hover, and press effects for _FilledTvButton.

classes.name: _OutlinedTvButton
classes.description: A focusable outlined button with label, used in settings and search.

classes.name: _OutlinedTvButtonState
classes.description: State for focus and interaction effects of _OutlinedTvButton.

classes.name: _SearchFieldStub
classes.description: A focusable, styled placeholder for a search input field, with activation handling.

classes.name: _SearchFieldStubState
classes.description: State for focus and interaction in the search stub.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of focus nodes to free resources.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget UI, handling focus, hover, pressed states, and interactions.
